automaticModemAssignmentUpdated.title: Automatic modem assignment example-identifier was updated.
automaticModemAssignmentUpdated.description:
Automatic modem assignment example-identifier was updated:
 - Description: example => example updated
 - Parsers: [example-identifier] => [example-identifier, example-identifier-2, example-identifier-3]
 - Alarms: {example-identifier={"expected" : 24}} => {example-identifier={"expected" : 18}, example-identifier-2={"expected" : 20}, example-identifier-3={"expected" : 20}}
 - Modem Filter was updated
 - Manufacturers: [] => [my-modem-manufacturer]
